#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,a[100004],max,count;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        count=0;
        max=0;
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            
            if(a[i]==a[i-1])
                count++;
            else
                count=0;
                if(count>max)
                max=count;
        }
        cout<<max<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
